mapper.select: select * from pmdata where station = #{station} and `time` = #{time};
select * from stations where region = #{sido} and location = #{name};
mapper.insert: insert into pmdata ( station, `time`, pm10, pm25 ) values ( #{station}, #{time}, #{pm10Value}, #{pm25Value});
mapper.select: select * from pmdata where station = #{id} order by time desc limit 24;

select pm1.* , s.location, s.lat, s.lng from ( select station, max(time) AS latest from pmdata pm group by station ) pm0 join pmdata pm1 on pm0.latest = pm1.time and pm0.station = pm1.station join stations s on pm1.station = s.seq where s.region=#{id};

select pm1.*, s.region, round(avg(pm10),0) avgPm10, round(avg(pm25),0) avgPm25, count(pm10) countPm10, count(pm25) countPm25 from ( select station, max(time) AS latest from pmdata pm group by station ) pm0 join pmdata pm1 on pm0.latest = pm1.time and pm0.station = pm1.station join stations s on pm1.station = s.seq group by region;
